sentences.en: Have you made all your travel arrangements?
sentences.cn: 你的旅行都安排好了吗？

sentences.en: He has made every arrangement to meet any emergency.
sentences.cn: 他已作好了应急的一切准备.

sentences.en: He professed to be content with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 他对这个安排表示满意。

sentences.en: I hatched all the arrangement for the dance.
sentences.cn: 我为舞会做了一切安排.

sentences.en: It seemed a very satisfactory arrangement.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是个非常令人满意的安排。

sentences.en: It was a nifty arrangement, a perfect partnership.
sentences.cn: 这是绝妙的安排，完美的搭档。

sentences.en: Many people have expressed their dissatisfaction with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 许多人表示对这一安排不满。

sentences.en: The arrangement of light industry in the province needs adjustment.
sentences.cn: 那个省的轻工业布局需要调整.

sentences.en: The arrangement presumes that both lenders and borrowers are rational.
sentences.cn: 这一协议假定借贷双方都是在神志清楚的状态下签订的。

sentences.en: The arrangement was only intended as a stopgap.
sentences.cn: 这种安排不过是权宜之计而已。

sentences.en: The arrangement was put on a permanent footing earlier this year.
sentences.cn: 今年年初就确定了这一安排是长期性的.

sentences.en: the traditional arrangement of desks in rows
sentences.cn: 将书桌成排放置的传统做法

sentences.en: There have been calls for a new kind of security arrangement.
sentences.cn: 不少人呼吁出台新的安全措施。

sentences.en: There's nothing to keep me to such an arrangement.
sentences.cn: 什么也不能使我遵从这样的安排.

sentences.en: They proposed to make arrangement beforehand.
sentences.cn: 他们提议事先做好安排.

sentences.en: This arrangement is quite satisfactory, so far as I am concerned.
sentences.cn: 就我来说, 这样的安排很好.

sentences.en: We made a tentative arrangement to meet on Friday.

words.tran_cn: 安排；计划；准备（arrange的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 财务安排；融通资金安排
制度安排；制序安排；机构安排
为……做好准备；为……做好安排
并联装置（电路）；平行排列
n. 空间布置，空间排列

trans.tran_cn: 安排，筹划，布置，商定，协议，整理，改编乐曲
trans.tran_en: plans and preparations that you must make so that something can happen
